The purpose of this application is to serve as support for the "70 Cavaquinhos, 70 Artists" exhibition, where it is possible to not only make a virtual tour on the exhibition in order to see all the 70 exposed artworks, but also play a game where it is asked of the user to guess to which cavaquinho does a determined detail belong to.
This application was developed in partnership between the Associação Museu Cavaquinho and students of the Aveiro University, in the context of the existing protocol between the two entities.
Universidade de Aveiro, DETI: Tiago Henriques, with the support of Ilídio Oliveira, Marcelo Baptista, João Cruz.

In this game, you are given a piece of a cavaquinho, and then can drag and drop that piece to the correct answer!
You can also challenge a friend!
You are given the opportunity to crop a piece of a cavaquinho and challenge a friend!
This option is available in each cavaquinho.
You only need to open the provided menu and select the corresponding option.

You can then drag the corner of the provided square to decide an area to share. You can also rotate the cavaquinho.
The image is then ready to share.
The click on the provided button allows the share on Facebook or by other mean.
